meanings.definition: Coursewares: educational materials used in a course
meanings.sent1: The teacher prepared the coursewares for the upcoming science class.
meanings.sent2: Students accessed the coursewares online to study for their exams.
meanings.sent3: The coursewares were so engaging that even the sleepy students perked up.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of coursewares, ready to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The colorful coursewares made learning feel like a fun adventure.

meanings.definition: Coursewares: software designed for educational purposes
meanings.sent1: The school invested in new coursewares to enhance the students' learning experience.
meanings.sent2: Teachers used interactive coursewares to make lessons more engaging.
meanings.sent3: The coursewares glitched and turned the math problems into a dance party.
meanings.sent4: His brain processed information like a powerful coursewares program.
meanings.sent5: The coursewares transformed the classroom into a digital wonderland.
